LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: 「Heey! Tokiwa!」

LABEL: 0x2E2
STRING: My voice aimlessly calling out for Tokiwa was sucked into the walls, dampening without reaching anyone.

LABEL: 0x334
STRING: It was so quiet it felt like the waves had receded.

LABEL: 0x362
STRING: 「Damn it... I have no idea where Hiragino-sensei and Reiri went, either...」

LABEL: 0x3AA
STRING: Me muttering to myself wasn't involuntary at all.

LABEL: 0x3E4
STRING: This feeling of loneliness was getting unbearable.

LABEL: 0x40C
STRING: I sounded like a little girl who was afraid of ghosts...

LABEL: 0x444
STRING: Oh, right――

LABEL: 0x45C
STRING: 「POL! Can you hear me?」

LABEL: 0x47F
STRING: I raised my voice in the hallway. There must be a POL receiver somewhere around here.

LABEL: 0x4C4
STRING: I was sure if I called for it...

LABEL: 0x513
STRING: 【You called?】

LABEL: 0x533
STRING: A calm, androgynous voice could be heard from who knows where.

LABEL: 0x571
STRING: All right, POL was still operational.

LABEL: 0x5A0
STRING: With this thing that could see everything inside the <SHEEP III>, the search would be a piece of cake.

LABEL: 0x5FF
STRING: 「POL, do you know where Tokiwa is?」

LABEL: 0x630
STRING: 【Tokiwa?】

LABEL: 0x652
STRING: 「Saihouji Tokiwa, a passenger. Look, she's a strange girl wearing a kimono.」

LABEL: 0x694
STRING: 【My apologies. I am prohibited from giving out personal information.】

LABEL: 0x6EE
STRING: 「Seriously...?」

LABEL: 0x70A
STRING: 【Seriously.】

LABEL: 0x73E
STRING: POL sounded apologetic.

LABEL: 0x76B
STRING: Come to think of it, the crew couldn't tell the whereabouts of a passenger to anyone who wasn't their companion...

LABEL: 0x7D1
STRING: However, this was an abnormal situation.

LABEL: 0x7F7
STRING: POL should know by now that the rear section was submerged.

LABEL: 0x844
STRING: Did this mean that even if POL could pick up the information through its sensors, it didn't know what it meant?

LABEL: 0x90B
STRING: Geez... I guess this was as far as this state-of-the-art AI could go.

LABEL: 0x951
STRING: In unexpected situations, humans still held the advantage...

LABEL: 0x991
STRING: We had the ability to dynamically interpret the meaning of each event we came across.

LABEL: 0x9CB
STRING: However, in order to obtain the information needed to interpret it first,

LABEL: 0xA17
STRING: we had no choice but to walk on our own two feet.

LABEL: 0xCCD
STRING: I briskly continued down the hallway.

LABEL: 0xCF9
STRING: She could be in the lobby or in one of the rooms here...

LABEL: 0xD2F
STRING: I had left in such a hurry, but I guess all I could do now was look around everywhere.

LABEL: 0xD7F
STRING: But still――

LABEL: 0xD9D
STRING: In a small ship like this,

LABEL: 0xDC1
STRING: with our limited numbers,

LABEL: 0xDE3
STRING: why was it so hard for us to stay together in one place?

LABEL: 0xEB2
STRING: I muttered to myself, this time without thinking.

LABEL: 0xEDE
STRING: Why was it?

LABEL: 0xF04
STRING: The communications were about to be restored―I wasn't saying that was the only guarantee we had.

LABEL: 0xF52
STRING: The components necessary for our escape were in sight. And yet, our goal was still far away.

LABEL: 0xFFB
STRING: Why couldn't we escape?

LABEL: 0x1021
STRING: I didn't know each individual reason.

LABEL: 0x1047
STRING: This may be irrational, but here's what I think.

LABEL: 0x107D
STRING: We couldn't return yet.

LABEL: 0x10A1
STRING: Wasn't that how it was?

LABEL: 0x10CB
STRING: In other words, Reiri, Tokiwa, and perhaps everyone else too...

LABEL: 0x110F
STRING: They were all holding onto something.

LABEL: 0x112F
STRING: If we couldn't escape as we were...

LABEL: 0x11C0
STRING: 「If there are still obstacles somewhere――」

LABEL: 0x11F0
STRING: ――I had no choice but to solve each and every one of them.

LABEL: 0x1498
STRING: My first stop was the library.

LABEL: 0x14C2
STRING: It was the place where I'd been reunited with Tokiwa after the accident had occurred, and the rear section was submerged.

LABEL: 0x150A
STRING: I remembered Tokiwa emerging from under the desk and bringing her back to everyone.

LABEL: 0x15B5
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x15CD
STRING: I crouched down and looked under the same desk, but there was no sign of the kimono-clad girl.

LABEL: 0x188F
STRING: Tokiwa seemed to adore Hiragino a lot...

LABEL: 0x18C5
STRING: Thinking back, it didn't seem like there had been any kind of trigger for it.

LABEL: 0x1911
STRING: When things were more peaceful, she was so clingy that you could call her a stalker.

LABEL: 0x1955
STRING: I guess some people would feel envious, but after seeing how troubled Hiragino was by it...

LABEL: 0x19B9
STRING: The desk in the emergency room, and the bed.

LABEL: 0x19DF
STRING: I took a quick look around, but there was no sign of anyone there.

LABEL: 0x1A3D
STRING: ...What was with this strange feeling?

LABEL: 0x1A67
STRING: There was something about how things were arranged here...

LABEL: 0x1A9B
STRING: However, I couldn't remember the exact placement of everything in the room in the first place.

LABEL: 0x1AE3
STRING: Just my imagination, maybe?

LABEL: 0x1B66
STRING: I left the emergency room without any evidence.

LABEL: 0x1E31
STRING: And then――

LABEL: 0x1E49
STRING: Next up was the theater room.

LABEL: 0x1E73
STRING: The display that covered the entire surface of the room, which resembled a hemispherical planetarium, was showing the night sky.

LABEL: 0x1ECF
STRING: At the bottom of the sea, the night sky was recreated inside this cage.

LABEL: 0x1EFF
STRING: A fleeting scene built upon countless people's ingenuity.

LABEL: 0x1F41
STRING: There, right under that sky, she stood.

LABEL: 0x1F71
STRING: 「Tokiwa...」

LABEL: 0x1FAD
STRING: I wasn't even calling out to her.

LABEL: 0x1FD9
STRING: I could only marvel at the sight of the kimono-wearing girl standing under this beautiful artificial starry sky, as if it were a painting.

LABEL: 0x204B
STRING: But even so, my quiet voice seemed to reach her.

LABEL: 0x209A
STRING: 「――My father used to say...」

LABEL: 0x20C2
STRING: 「"Two things fill the mind with ever new and increasing admiration and awe, the more often and steadily we reflect upon them:

LABEL: 0x20FA
STRING: the starry heavens above me and the moral law within me."」

LABEL: 0x2139
STRING: Tokiwa quoted the famous words of Kant.

LABEL: 0x216F
STRING: Under the sky full of stars, she seemed to be mulling over each word.

LABEL: 0x21AD
STRING: Not as a quote from Kant but as a remembrance of her father.

LABEL: 0x21F3
STRING: Those words were not just a quote to her.

LABEL: 0x222F
STRING: With no context, I couldn't tell what the words meant to her.

LABEL: 0x226B
STRING: I couldn't tell, but...

LABEL: 0x228B
STRING: Eventually, her tone changed, and she began to speak in a feeble voice.

LABEL: 0x233B
STRING: 「...I've always been trying to do the "right" thing, I thought.」

LABEL: 0x23B1
STRING: 「Science can save people.」

LABEL: 0x23D3
STRING: 「Thinking back on it now, it seems conceited of me, but at the time I truly thought so.」

LABEL: 0x2421
STRING: 「Noblesse Oblige――I am a genius.」

LABEL: 0x245E
STRING: 「And as a genius, I must help people. Science is the means to do that.」

LABEL: 0x24E6
STRING: 「But, maybe I was wrong.」

LABEL: 0x2526
STRING: 「Rather than helping...」

LABEL: 0x25BF
STRING: 「Why did I make something like that?」

LABEL: 0x260C
STRING: Tokiwa directed her question to the heavens.

LABEL: 0x263E
STRING: It was regret.

LABEL: 0x265A
STRING: And, repentance.

LABEL: 0x2676
STRING: Her emotionless eyes yearned for the stars.

LABEL: 0x26A2
STRING: However, her feelings couldn't reach them――

LABEL: 0x26D0
STRING: The false stars continued to shine in silence, as if mocking the girl.

LABEL: 0x2748
STRING: 「...I don't know anything, but...」

LABEL: 0x2772
STRING: 「People have talked for a long time about the corruption and declining level of education in Japanese universities.」

LABEL: 0x27C0
STRING: 「I graduated with a degree, but the most I can do is some programming.」

LABEL: 0x281C
STRING: 「As it turns out... I'm not even close to a high schooler like Reiri in that regard.」

LABEL: 0x286C
STRING: 「And as you know... I keep making mistakes.」

LABEL: 0x28A6
STRING: 「I said I didn't think it would turn out this way, and I――」

LABEL: 0x2958
STRING: 「...What are you trying to say?」

LABEL: 0x29A3
STRING: 「I don't think I'll ever be able to understand everything that you're going through.」

LABEL: 0x29F9
STRING: 「However... I've made a mountain of mistakes and failures that I can't take back.」

LABEL: 0x2A59
STRING: 「If you want to talk to me, it might offer some relief.」

LABEL: 0x2A97
STRING: 「I'm willing to listen.」

LABEL: 0x2B4B
STRING: 「Even if it's a long story?」

LABEL: 0x2B76
STRING: Tokiwa showed unusually honest concern.

LABEL: 0x2BAC
STRING: I guess she wasn't aware that she was always talking about long-winded and meaningless things... Well, maybe not.

LABEL: 0x2C0E
STRING: But at this moment, that was exactly what I wanted.

LABEL: 0x2C3C
STRING: When I nodded, Tokiwa smiled a little, and before long, she began to talk with narrowed eyes as if recalling the distant past.

LABEL: 0x2CB3
STRING: 「In the past, ROMLES approached me with a request――」

LABEL: 0x2CF1
STRING: 「A question of whether marine life could be contained within a specific area without harming it.」

LABEL: 0x2D77
STRING: 「It sounded simple, but it turned out to be a difficult problem.」

LABEL: 0x2DD1
STRING: 「To use a metaphor, it was like asking me to verify the Abel-Ruffini theorem...」

LABEL: 0x2E29
STRING: 「Even aquariums can't fulfill the requirement of "not harming" the creatures inside them.」

LABEL: 0x2E75
STRING: 「Not to mention, they wanted to implement it in an open sea.」

LABEL: 0x2EC2
STRING: Trying to contain the fish swimming freely in the sea...

LABEL: 0x2F00
STRING: By "not harming," did they mean that physical barriers were not an option?

LABEL: 0x2F50
STRING: That was easy to say, but no matter how you looked at it, it went against the laws of nature.

LABEL: 0x2F9C
STRING: I see. Contrary to how simple it was to imagine, you couldn't come up with a solution easily.

LABEL: 0x306C
STRING: 「They were barking up the wrong tree to begin with.」

LABEL: 0x309E
STRING: 「I'd already been involved in some research and development,

LABEL: 0x30EC
STRING: but I wasn't some renowned marine researcher.」

LABEL: 0x312E
STRING: 「Perhaps they came to me out of desperation,

LABEL: 0x3188
STRING: after being rejected by more prominent experts than myself.」

LABEL: 0x3229
STRING: 「Given the situation, it was almost like an entreaty to God.」

LABEL: 0x3260
STRING: Tokiwa gave off a bitter smile.

LABEL: 0x327E
STRING: Entreaty to God――

LABEL: 0x3296
STRING: I shuddered at the weight of those words.

LABEL: 0x32BE
STRING: It had been a request to a single girl from people who had no choice but to cling to God.

LABEL: 0x330A
STRING: A few years ago, she would have still been in high school...

LABEL: 0x333C
STRING: There was no way that a young girl like her could bear a heavy responsibility like that.

LABEL: 0x3402
STRING: 「But for me, it was my duty to answer that impossible question.」

LABEL: 0x3452
STRING: 「So, what I referred to was...」

LABEL: 0x347C
STRING: 「――Bubble-net feeding.」

LABEL: 0x34B5
STRING: 「Bubble-net feeding...」

LABEL: 0x34E3
STRING: The hunting technique used by humpback whales that Tokiwa had explained earlier.

LABEL: 0x353E
STRING: 「By using air bubbles to surround the sea creatures, you might be able to contain them without harming them.」

LABEL: 0x35A8
STRING: 「And... the <Isle of Wind> that I was working on at the time for another project,

LABEL: 0x366A
STRING: just happened to be the perfect match for the task.」

LABEL: 0x36A5
STRING: The <Isle of Wind>.

LABEL: 0x36BF
STRING: It was a man-made island built in Kurama Bay after the Aqualine accident.

LABEL: 0x3772
STRING: A landmark that was now hailed as a symbol of technology. Sealed inside were the events of that disaster.

LABEL: 0x37C4
STRING: It was a white tombstone that would never let the memory of the accident be forgotten.

LABEL: 0x381F
STRING: 「The fundamental concept of the <Isle of Wind> has nothing to do with wind power.」

LABEL: 0x3869
STRING: 「The main focus was on the practical application of artificial photosynthesis to harness energy.」

LABEL: 0x38B6
STRING: I had read about that in the papers.

LABEL: 0x38E6
STRING: How many years ago was it that Tokiwa wrote that journal?

LABEL: 0x3938
STRING: 「ARPChem―the Artificial Photosynthesis Chemical Process Technology Research Association―was founded in 2012.」

LABEL: 0x3995
STRING: 「For the next ten years, the Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry gave them a budget.」

LABEL: 0x39D7
STRING: 「One day, my father invited me to a debriefing, and when I went to observe...」

LABEL: 0x3A29
STRING: 「That's when it occurred to me.」

LABEL: 0x3A57
STRING: 「By combining the energy of wind and wave power generators with photoelectromagnetic electrodes, which are infinitely beautiful,

LABEL: 0x3AB1
STRING: it's possible to increase the energy conversion efficiency of artificial photosynthesis to 12%%...」

LABEL: 0x3B37
STRING: 「But in doing so, not only are methane and other organic matter produced at the same time, but also oxygen.」

LABEL: 0x3B95
STRING: 「I thought that you could create a bubble net with the oxygen produced in that process.」

LABEL: 0x3BF5
STRING: 「Not only that, but just by using oxygen,

LABEL: 0x3C39
STRING: we would be able to tackle the problem of the anoxic waters that are unique to Kurama Bay...」

LABEL: 0x3C8D
STRING: 「...Well, that was just a bonus.」

LABEL: 0x3CC0
STRING: In other words,

LABEL: 0x3CE6
STRING: if it was under the <Isle of Wind> in Kurama Bay,

LABEL: 0x3D76
STRING: isolating the area was possible――

LABEL: 0x3DFF
STRING: 「That plan...」

LABEL: 0x3E8B
STRING: 「I just thought...」

LABEL: 0x3EB7
STRING: 「I merely suggested that it could be possible that way.」

LABEL: 0x3EF1
STRING: 「Even if it wasn't in Kurama Bay, if we used a facility that worked the same way as the <Isle of Wind>, then...」

LABEL: 0x3F41
STRING: 「I thought it was all over and done with...」

LABEL: 0x3FAF
STRING: 「I had no idea this was going to happen――!」

LABEL: 0x3FEE
STRING: Her voice trembled.

LABEL: 0x4018
STRING: ...Was she crying?

LABEL: 0x403C
STRING: Under the starry sky, I couldn't see Tokiwa's downcast face.

LABEL: 0x4076
STRING: However, there was something unusually emotional about her voice, which had always maintained a steady tone.

LABEL: 0x40D0
STRING: 「...What happened?」

LABEL: 0x40FF
STRING: 「...I understood everything just now.」

LABEL: 0x4131
STRING: 「What I've done...!」

LABEL: 0x41F4
STRING: 「It seems that the area ROMLES wanted to isolate was in this very Kurama Bay.」

LABEL: 0x424A
STRING: 「But, they didn't adopt my proposal as is...!」

LABEL: 0x4298
STRING: 「What they were looking for wasn't a way to "safely" isolate the creatures.」

LABEL: 0x42EC
STRING: 「They wanted to make sure absolutely no creatures would leave this area.」

LABEL: 0x433B
STRING: 「What do you mean...?」

LABEL: 0x4372
STRING: 「What they've put in this sea is ozone―a cage of deadly poison.」

LABEL: 0x43D7
STRING: ――Ozone.

LABEL: 0x43F1
STRING: A gas with strong oxidizing properties used to kill various viruses and bacteria.

LABEL: 0x4445
STRING: If you used that to create a cage of bubbles, you'd be able to completely contain the marine life in the area...

LABEL: 0x44AE
STRING: 「If you think about it that way... everything makes sense.」

LABEL: 0x44E4
STRING: 「The cause of this accident, as well.」

LABEL: 0x450B
STRING: 「The cause...?」

LABEL: 0x452D
STRING: Come to think of it, Tokiwa did say it wasn't because of methane hydrate...

LABEL: 0x45E9
STRING: 「――Ozone explosion.」

LABEL: 0x460D
STRING: 「High concentrations of ozone had somehow accumulated on the seafloor.」

LABEL: 0x464F
STRING: 「High-density, low-purity ozone can cause an explosion if stimulated by an electrical discharge or otherwise.」

LABEL: 0x46BA
STRING: 「So when the <SHEEP III> ran into it――」

LABEL: 0x4704
STRING: 「...It's a hypothesis, but I think it's very plausible.」

LABEL: 0x4741
STRING: Tokiwa nodded to herself.

LABEL: 0x47D3
STRING: I heard her explanation, but had something like that really happened...?

LABEL: 0x4813
STRING: It was so grandiose that it was hard to believe.

LABEL: 0x48A0
STRING: Complete isolation of marine life in a specific area of the sea―it sounded insane, if anything.

LABEL: 0x48FE
STRING: Tokiwa's research results were astonishing, but even before that,

LABEL: 0x4942
STRING: there was something wrong with ROMLES for thinking about doing it in the first place.

LABEL: 0x4988
STRING: ROMLES had asked Tokiwa to do such a reckless thing, as if putting their trust in God.

LABEL: 0x49D6
STRING: What the hell were they――

LABEL: 0x4A51
STRING: 「...What the hell did ROMLES want to contain so badly?」

LABEL: 0x4A9D
STRING: They didn't want anything escaping this area.

LABEL: 0x4ACF
STRING: They were trying to contain something in these waters.

LABEL: 0x4B03
STRING: For what reason did ROMLES have to go to these lengths, even operating in secret...?

LABEL: 0x4B5B
STRING: I had no idea.

LABEL: 0x4B81
STRING: Tokiwa shook her head as well.

LABEL: 0x4C1B
STRING: 「...I wasn't informed about the purpose.」

LABEL: 0x4C59
STRING: 「In the first place, I was asked to do it through my father... I don't know if even he knew what they were up to...」

LABEL: 0x4CBC
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x4D44
STRING: 「Nevertheless...」

LABEL: 0x4D62
STRING: 「I should've been responsible for the purpose as well...!」

LABEL: 0x4DD8
STRING: 「I've done a terrible thing.」

LABEL: 0x4E10
STRING: 「I'm sure the ozone has already killed many innocent creatures...」

LABEL: 0x4E56
STRING: 「Not only that, but this accident has taken the lives of many more...」

LABEL: 0x4EA9
STRING: 「...But, that was something you didn't know――」

LABEL: 0x4F74
STRING: 「I could have found out!!」

LABEL: 0x4FA8
STRING: When I tried to comfort her, she deflected my arm and raised her voice.

LABEL: 0x4FE6
STRING: Her eyes were wider than ever.

LABEL: 0x5012
STRING: She was looking straight at me as if trying to pierce me with her true feelings.

LABEL: 0x5066
STRING: Seeing her wide-open eyes, I flinched.

LABEL: 0x5096
STRING: Tokiwa repeated herself.

LABEL: 0x5122
STRING: 「I could have found out...」

LABEL: 0x514E
STRING: 「I just didn't want to know.」

LABEL: 0x5184
STRING: 「I should have thought harder about it.」

LABEL: 0x51BA
STRING: 「But I failed to do so... There was no sense of responsibility, nothing. I was just a fool.」

LABEL: 0x520D
STRING: 「Tokiwa...」

LABEL: 0x5238
STRING: 「ROMLES must have asked me to do it because they knew I wouldn't look into it.」

LABEL: 0x529A
STRING: 「Like a device that automatically spits out an answer when you input a question.」

LABEL: 0x52DC
STRING: 「A puppet who gets used by the adults and is proud of it...」

LABEL: 0x5335
STRING: 「Don't say that――」

LABEL: 0x5366
STRING: 「I'm not a machine!」

LABEL: 0x53AE
STRING: 「My... inner moral code...!」

LABEL: 0x53E7
STRING: Quietly, tears began to run down her cheeks.

LABEL: 0x540F
STRING: Her eyes wavered.

LABEL: 0x5427
STRING: But eventually, as if giving up, she wiped her eyes and whispered in a low voice.

LABEL: 0x5478
STRING: 「Maybe I don't possess a human heart.」

LABEL: 0x54C1
STRING: 「What are you――」

LABEL: 0x54EA
STRING: 「I've been told that for a long time.」

LABEL: 0x5517
STRING: With her eyes still dark, Tokiwa spat out those words like she had given up on something.

LABEL: 0x55CD
STRING: 「I've been told that for a long time.」

LABEL: 0x55F5
STRING: 「That I might be smart, sure, but there's something greater missing.」

LABEL: 0x563B
STRING: 「That I have a major personality problem.」

LABEL: 0x566E
STRING: 「That's just the resentment of people who don't have what you do.」

LABEL: 0x56AA
STRING: 「There's no need to pay them any mind――」

LABEL: 0x56EF
STRING: 「I thought the same thing.」

LABEL: 0x571F
STRING: 「But, it's no use at that point. I'm disqualified. As a person.」

LABEL: 0x5795
STRING: 「I couldn't find out what I was missing.」

LABEL: 0x57DF
STRING: 「It's only now that I realize I've been used as a machine...」

LABEL: 0x5831
STRING: 「After all, I――」

LABEL: 0x58BB
STRING: 「...Shut up.」

LABEL: 0x58D5
STRING: A low voice slipped out of my mouth.

LABEL: 0x58FB
STRING: Tokiwa, who was talking on the verge of tears like she was desperate for an answer, suddenly fell silent.

LABEL: 0x5953
STRING: I was surprised myself.

LABEL: 0x5981
STRING: I couldn't believe the words coming out of my mouth.

LABEL: 0x59BF
STRING: However, there was no mistaking what I was thinking deep inside.

LABEL: 0x5A01
STRING: I didn't want to hear any more self-deprecating words from Tokiwa's mouth.

LABEL: 0x5B06
STRING: 「Tokiwa, I don't presume to know how you feel, but...」

LABEL: 0x5B46
STRING: 「I don't think of you as a machine.」

LABEL: 0x5B80
STRING: 「You don't possess a human heart? Bullshit.」

LABEL: 0x5BD5
STRING: 「But I really don't understand...」

LABEL: 0x5C03
STRING: 「People's hearts――」

LABEL: 0x5C93
STRING: 「There's no one who does!」

LABEL: 0x5CC7
STRING: I rebuked Tokiwa, who was still condemning herself.

LABEL: 0x5CF3
STRING: But, the light in her eyes was still dark and focused on a single point.

LABEL: 0x5D2F
STRING: My words didn't reach her... No, she had no intention of accepting them.

LABEL: 0x5D7F
STRING: What a stupid... Yeah, you sure are an idiot.

LABEL: 0x5DB7
STRING: You don't understand anything――

LABEL: 0x5DD9
STRING: 「No one can understand it. No one can know what's in people's hearts.」

LABEL: 0x5E0B
STRING: 「Even so, everyone's trying their best in their personal relationships.」

LABEL: 0x5E4D
STRING: 「I don't know what you've been told in the past but don't run away over something like that.」

LABEL: 0x5F07
STRING: 「...I'm not running away.」

LABEL: 0x5F40
STRING: 「You are.」

LABEL: 0x5F5A
STRING: 「By telling yourself that you're lacking something,

LABEL: 0x5F9C
STRING: you're running away from what you should be able to do, what you couldn't do, and what you can make up for.」

LABEL: 0x5FFF
STRING: 「――But, there's no making up for it now!」

LABEL: 0x6047
STRING: 「Just thinking of all the inventions I've made, all the research I've done, and what it will lead to...」

LABEL: 0x60AF
STRING: 「I... I've already made a mistake that I can't take back.」

LABEL: 0x60FD
STRING: 「Knowing that, what am I supposed to do?」

LABEL: 0x614D
STRING: 「There's nothing you can do to change it now!」

LABEL: 0x6192
STRING: As I lashed out, Tokiwa's face contorted as if she were about to burst into tears.

LABEL: 0x61D8
STRING: Her face looked like that of a child throwing a tantrum,

LABEL: 0x6212
STRING: much younger than one would expect from her normally aloof appearance.

LABEL: 0x62AF
STRING: Yes―Tokiwa was childish.

LABEL: 0x62D3
STRING: She was still a teenage girl, of course, but it was beyond that.

LABEL: 0x6323
STRING: However, she was definitely not a defect.

LABEL: 0x6359
STRING: She just didn't know it yet.

LABEL: 0x642C
STRING: 「Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x6444
STRING: 「There's no mistake you can't make up for.」

LABEL: 0x6487
STRING: 「You're just saying that...」

LABEL: 0x64AC
STRING: 「I'm not.」

LABEL: 0x64D2
STRING: 「We may not be able to get back what we lost, but we can do what we can to not lose any more.」

LABEL: 0x652C
STRING: 「That can only be done by those who have lost something.」

LABEL: 0x656C
STRING: 「That's how you make up for your mistakes. No matter how long it takes.」

LABEL: 0x65BE
STRING: 「...Or, are you going to irresponsibly repeat the same mistakes, saying they cannot be undone?」

LABEL: 0x66A4
STRING: 「...Is it okay for me to make a mistake?」

LABEL: 0x66E1
STRING: It was an infinitely pure question.

LABEL: 0x6711
STRING: Tokiwa looked at me with strained eyebrows, like she was holding something back.

LABEL: 0x676C
STRING: 「I don't want to make mistakes. No, I can't make mistakes...」

LABEL: 0x67B8
STRING: 「I thought that continuing to answer an endless stream of questions was the reason for my existence...」

LABEL: 0x6816
STRING: 「Otherwise, I'd be worthless――」

LABEL: 0x6859
STRING: 「People make mistakes. We all do. We say we won't make the same mistake twice, but even that's not perfect.」

LABEL: 0x68C3
STRING: 「The same goes for you. Tokiwa, you're not a machine.」

LABEL: 0x6910
STRING: 「Then, I...」

LABEL: 0x6995
STRING: 「...Am I allowed to cry?」

LABEL: 0x69E8
STRING: The bursting point came soon after.

LABEL: 0x6A12
STRING: The door to the theater room was closed.

LABEL: 0x6A40
STRING: This facility was soundproof, most likely.

LABEL: 0x6A86
STRING: I caught the loudly crying Tokiwa on my chest.

LABEL: 0x6AEA
STRING: It was always hard to tell her true feelings when she acted so wildly and said things at her own pace.

LABEL: 0x6B34
STRING: And so, while she was shunned, she was also relied upon in times of emergency.

LABEL: 0x6B72
STRING: From software to hardware, she continued to meet our expectations with her extensive knowledge and ideas.

LABEL: 0x6BBE
STRING: I was sure that wasn't the case just here, either.

LABEL: 0x6BF4
STRING: She must have played that role many times during her life.

LABEL: 0x6C99
STRING: Detached―the role of the girl genius.

LABEL: 0x6CC9
STRING: That was her fate... She would gain and lose things from it, but she couldn't avoid it.

LABEL: 0x6D31
STRING: She was never allowed to err or regret.

LABEL: 0x6DD4
STRING: ――What a violation of humanity.

LABEL: 0x6DFA
STRING: Doing that to a girl who wasn't even 20 years old...

LABEL: 0x6E68
STRING: Tokiwa cried.

LABEL: 0x6E8C
STRING: I hugged her, but I had no words to say to her.

LABEL: 0x6ED8
STRING: These thoughts would be cliched if put into words.

LABEL: 0x6F0A
STRING: Instead, I tightened my arms around her.

LABEL: 0x6F3C
STRING: Tokiwa's arms trembled in response.

LABEL: 0x6F6E
STRING: My unspoken thoughts must have made it through to her.

LABEL: 0x6FBE
STRING: She was neither a machine nor a doll.

LABEL: 0x7047
STRING: She was just a girl――

LABEL: 0x739B
STRING: 「...I'm sorry for all the trouble.」

LABEL: 0x73CE
STRING: 「It was no trouble at all.」

LABEL: 0x7460
STRING: 「...Well then, thank you very much.」

LABEL: 0x749B
STRING: Tokiwa bowed her head laudably.

LABEL: 0x74C1
STRING: Her eyes were red after she rubbed them.

LABEL: 0x74E1
STRING: Tokiwa didn't seem to be bothered by any of this,

LABEL: 0x7513
STRING: but perhaps because I'd just seen her crying, I felt a bit embarrassed as she looked at me with that expression.

LABEL: 0x7590
STRING: 「After crying this much,

LABEL: 0x75C8
STRING: I've made a decision.」

LABEL: 0x7689
STRING: 「Noblesse Oblige――I am a genius.」

LABEL: 0x76C6
STRING: 「If those around me wish for me to be like that, then I will fulfill my role.」

LABEL: 0x7721
STRING: 「But, what about...」

LABEL: 0x7758
STRING: 「...And, even if I make mistakes...」

LABEL: 0x7790
STRING: 「I can keep on living with the stars as my guide.」

LABEL: 0x77F1
STRING: Tokiwa looked up at the false starry sky.

LABEL: 0x781B
STRING: Her tragic determination stung my heart.

LABEL: 0x7845
STRING: Tokiwa was trying to overcome her own mistakes.

LABEL: 0x7885
STRING: Would I... be able to walk forward again in search of the right thing?

LABEL: 0x78CB
STRING: No...

LABEL: 0x78E5
STRING: I had no choice but to start walking again――

LABEL: 0x7919
STRING: 「...Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x7933
STRING: 「The stars―the constellations...」

LABEL: 0x7953
STRING: 「They've been humanity's compass for a long time.」

LABEL: 0x79E2
STRING: In this vast sea, in the dark with no clues...

LABEL: 0x7A1A
STRING: ...The stars remained as our only guide.

LABEL: 0x7A4E
STRING: I looked up at the sphere and gazed at the stars.

LABEL: 0x7A78
STRING: Even if this was just a temporary night sky,

LABEL: 0x7AA0
STRING: I was certain that the stars twinkling light would show us the way forward.

LABEL: 0x7ADE
STRING: I was certain...

LABEL: 0x7B29
STRING: 「This planetarium is wrong.」

LABEL: 0x7B64
STRING: 「Wrong how...?」

LABEL: 0x7B8A
STRING: Just as I was about to ask what she meant, I followed her gaze...

LABEL: 0x7BC2
STRING: ...And immediately noticed it myself.

LABEL: 0x7BF4
STRING: ――Orion was visible.

LABEL: 0x7C1A
STRING: Gemini and Taurus, too.

LABEL: 0x7C3C
STRING: 「Looks like the settings are wrong.」

LABEL: 0x7C64
STRING: 「It's the middle of summer right now, but isn't this a winter sky?」

LABEL: 0x7CAB
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x7CC1
STRING: 「Oh, no, that's true, but...」

LABEL: 0x7CF5
STRING: 「Those constellations――」

LABEL: 0x7D1B
STRING: 「Orion isn't complete.」

LABEL: 0x7D5A
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x7D70
STRING: What the hell was she talking about?

LABEL: 0x7DA0
STRING: Tokiwa raised her hand and pointed to Orion as I was lost in confusion.

LABEL: 0x7DFF
STRING: 「Look, Betelgeuse――」

LABEL: 0x7E2E
STRING: 「Yeah, but what about it――」

LABEL: 0x7E56
STRING: ...I stopped myself mid-sentence.

LABEL: 0x7E7E
STRING: Could it be...? But was that even possible?

LABEL: 0x7EC0
STRING: Now was the only time to make sure.

LABEL: 0x7F97
STRING: 「...Hey, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x7FB9
STRING: 「Do you know what the "Fourth Day" is?」

LABEL: 0x7FF8
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x8013
STRING: She tilted her head at my sudden question.

LABEL: 0x803F
STRING: After seemingly thinking for a while, Tokiwa answered with confidence.

LABEL: 0x80F7
STRING: 「...Something from the Bible?」

LABEL: 0x8201
STRING: I knew it... But how?!

LABEL: 0x8229
STRING: Intense discomfort washed over me.

LABEL: 0x8245
STRING: Fear of an overwhelming abnormality.

LABEL: 0x8277
STRING: I suppressed my emotions and turned away from Tokiwa so that she wouldn't realize my shock.

LABEL: 0x8374
STRING: 「...No, it's nothing.」

LABEL: 0x8406
STRING: 「Huh... You're being weird, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x8437
STRING: Tokiwa yawned. She was already back to her usual self.

LABEL: 0x8485
STRING: Okay... It should be fine now.

LABEL: 0x84AD
STRING: 「Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x84C5
STRING: 「Let's go back to the others.」

LABEL: 0x8559
STRING: 「Yes, let's.」

LABEL: 0x858E
STRING: Tokiwa gripped the hand I had instinctively extended toward her.

LABEL: 0x85C2
STRING: I instantly felt embarrassed but didn't let go.

LABEL: 0x8600
STRING: One by one, we were regaining our connections.

LABEL: 0x8636
STRING: Like weaving a broken chain back together.

LABEL: 0x866A
STRING: And so, the two of us started walking forward, side by side.
